TI: [Affinity of tritiated S-adenosyl-L-homocysteine for membrane preparations from various parts of rat the rat brain].
AB: The study of tritiated S-adenosyl-L-homocysteine binding in various areas of the Rat brain has shown that the affinity was the same in the different regions whereas the number of binding sites was greater in the hippocampus and in the cerebellum than in the cortex, the corpus striatum, the mesencephalon, the hypothalamus and the brainstem. The phosphatidylethanolamine-N-methylase activity was also greater in the hippocampus and in the cerebellum.
TT: Affinite la S-adenosyl-L-homocysteine tritee pour des preparations membranaires de differentes parties du cerveau de rat.
TA: C R Seances Acad Sci III
JT: Comptes rendus des seances de l'Academie des sciences. Serie III, Sciences de la vie
SO: C R Seances Acad Sci III. 1981 Oct 26;293(7):355-7.
